p: J.E.C. has served as a consultant for Takeda Vaccines, Sanofi Pasteur, Pfizer, and Novavax, is on the Scientific Advisory Boards of CompuVax and Meissa Vaccines, and is Founder of IDBiologics. M.S.D. is a consultant for Inbios and Emergent BioSolutions and on the Scientific Advisory Board of Moderna. IDRI has applied for a patent related to the NLC formulation. All other authors declare no competing interests.
